```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
my_data <- readr::read_csv("Links2018.csv")
my_data <- my_data$url
```

```{r}
purrr::map(my_data,~{
  scrape_news(.x)
}) %>% 
  bind_rows()-> my_data
readr::write_rds(my_data, here::here("scraping-2018.rds"))
```

```{r}
library(tidytext)
my_data <- readRDS("/cloud/project/scraping-2018.rds")
```
